fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check someone, You will Perform the following abilities on them:
• Lookout (53)
• Tracker (54)
• Spy (62)
• Sheriff (20), Only on nights 1, 4, 7...
• Investigator (35), Only on nights 2, 5, 8...
• Consigliere (70), Only on nights 3, 6, 9...

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know who Evil factions visit each night.
- At the end of odd-numbered nights, you will recieve the name of 3 players, at least 1 of them doesnt win with Town.
- At the end of even-numbered nights, you will recieve the name of 2 players, at least 1 of them wins with Town.
